<ol>
</ol><ul><li>This project is about constructing a robot that will detect and read the text from hard copy of book or newspaper and convert it to speech. It is based on image processing and text to speech algorithm.</li><li> This robot can also be used to convert hard copy of book into soft copy. One can extend this robot so that it will be able to read nameplates in shops, etc. This robot has many applications such as banks, schools, for blind and illiterate people. </li><li>It can also translate and read in presence of internet using Google Translate. Then with the help of this robot, one can read foreign texts and documents with ease. </li></ul><p style="margin-left: 20px; text-align: center;">                                                                                                                                                                      .<img class="irc_mut" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," width="221" height="220" style="font-size: 14px; margin-top: 86px;"></p><p><a href="https://www.google.co.in/search?q=reading+robot&amp;client=ubuntu&amp;hs=0p&amp;channel=fs&amp;source=lnms&amp;tbm=isch&amp;sa=X&amp;ei=AbFwU6L3L8egugTsiIGQAg&amp;ved=0CAgQ_AUoAQ&amp;biw=1301&amp;bih=678#facrc=_&amp;imgdii=_&amp;imgrc=R4qg_fPc8cXkbM%253A%3BXgB2uyGRRnZOXM%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.matanyahorowitz.com%252Fimages%252F5%252F50%252FRobot_reading.jpg%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.matanyahorowitz.com%252Findex.php%253Ftitle%253DFile%253ARobot_reading.jpg%3B347%3B346"></a></p>
